column4: UPDATE 2-Tesla starts taking orders for premium solar roofs
column5: May 10 Tesla Inc  on Wednesday began taking orders for its solar roof tiles  a cornerstone of Elon Musk's strategy to sell a fossil-fuel-free lifestyle under the brand name of its luxury electric vehicles.

column4: Nvidia says Toyota will use its AI technology for self-driving cars
column5: SAN JOSE Nvidia Corp announced a partnership with Toyota Motor Corp on Wednesday  saying the Japanese car maker would use Nvidia's artificial intelligence technology to develop self-driving vehicle systems planned for the next few years.

column4: UPDATE 1-Nvidia says Toyota will use its AI technology for self-driving cars
column5: SAN JOSE  May 10 Nvidia Corp announced a partnership with Toyota Motor Corp on Wednesday  saying the Japanese car maker would use Nvidia's artificial intelligence technology to develop self-driving vehicle systems planned for the next few years.

column4: Nvidia says Toyota will use its technology for self-driving cars
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  May 10 Nvidia Corp and Toyota Motor Corp on Wednesday in a statement said the Japanese car maker would use Nvidia's microchip technology to develop self-driving vehicle systems planned for the next few years.
